caption: b'The products created from natural rubber are reliant on the health and well-being of the natural environment, as well as the people who live in it. As a renewable resource, Bridgestone is innovating to produce natural rubber in more sustainable ways. To learn more about our journey toward sustainable procurement, visit the link in our bio.'

b'\xe2\x80\x9cI became a member of the Bridgestone Americas Veterans Organization (BRAVO) pretty soon after I joined the company. To be a BRAVO member you do not have to have served- anyone at Bridgestone who supports the Military is encouraged to join. We want BRAVO to be a strong community for our members. I hope that BRAVO shows our teammates and leaders the value veterans bring to an organization. In addition to supporting our teammates, BRAVO is involved with several organizations including the Pat Tillman Foundation, which is very near and dear to my heart as Pat Tillman is who inspired me to join the Military after 9/11.\xe2\x80\x9d \xe2\x80\x93 Jason #BSATeammateTakeover'

b'\xe2\x80\x9cI just celebrated my 3 year anniversary with Bridgestone, working in both our Firestone Building Products group and now on our consumer tire marketing team. I\xe2\x80\x99ve met some incredible people through my job and thanks to our employee resource groups, and I truly feel a sense of comfort and acceptance as a part of the Bridgestone team.\xe2\x80\x9d \xe2\x80\x93 Jason #BSATeammateTakeover'

b'\xe2\x80\x9cThis #VeteransDay we honor the service and sacrifice of our military members, past and present, and their families and friends that support them. Each Veterans Day, I take time to reflect on the impact my teammates and colleagues in the Military have had on me, and how fortunate I have been to serve alongside our nation\xe2\x80\x99s best women and men. This year BRAVO sent care packages to several teammates, similar to the care packages military members would receive while away from home. Follow our stories today as I share what Veterans Day means to me and show you a day in my life.\xe2\x80\x9d \xe2\x80\x93 Jason #BSATeammateTakeover'

b'We are proud to recognize Veterans Day this week and honor our teammates who have answered the call to serve. Jason Pfeffer, current Bridgestone Americas Veterans Organization (BRAVO) president, is taking over our accounts to share more about his career with Bridgestone, how we\xe2\x80\x99re celebrating #VeteransDay and BRAVO, our employee resource group for veteran and non-veteran teammates. Follow along to learn what it means to #BeBridgestone. #BSATeammateTakeover'

b'We are proud to participate in #SWE for our seventh year! Visit us at our virtual booth during #WE20 to learn more about career opportunities in Engineering, IT and Manufacturing with Bridgestone. #PracticeCuriosity #BeBridgestone'

b'We are proud to announce our partnership with @indyachallenge to help accelerate the new generation of mobility. Bridgestone will serve as the exclusive tire supplier for the world\xe2\x80\x99s first head-to-head, high-speed autonomous race at @indianapolismotorspeedway on October 23, 2021.'

b'Bridgestone teammates are getting out the (early) vote! In anticipation of the Nov. 3 general election, teammates share selfies with their \xe2\x80\x9cI Voted\xe2\x80\x9d stickers and mail-in ballots to encourage others to #BeBridgestone and vote early. Check Vote.org to find out when and where you can cast your ballot on or before Election Day.'

b'Through Our Way to Serve and its layers of impact, we will set an example for our industry and lead in sustainable mobility. To join our journey toward a more sustainable future, visit the link in our bio.'

b'At the heart of the Maplewood High School Training Center is a fully-functioning Firestone Complete Auto Care store, complete with fixtures, equipment and point-of-sale software. The program gives students an opportunity to interact with customers and practice the skills they\xe2\x80\x99ve learned in the classroom such as oil changes, brake replacements and tire rotations. To learn about our extended partnership, click the link in our bio.'

b'Together with our suppliers and partners, we are determined to pioneer new innovations that deliver value to our customers and the world. To learn more about our journey toward a more sustainable society, visit the link in our bio.'

b'\xe2\x80\x9cToday\xe2\x80\x99s the day! We just had our virtual launch event for B~UNIDOS, our newest employee resource group for Hispanic and Latinx teammates and allies. We\xe2\x80\x99re excited to foster an inclusive culture within Bridgestone, as well as support our local Nashville community. Check out our stories to see some highlights from my day and learn more about B~UNIDOS!\xe2\x80\x9d \xe2\x80\x93 Paola #BSATeammateTakeover'

b'\xe2\x80\x9cOne of the ways I am celebrating #HispanicHeritageMonth this year is to connect with friends and teammates who are from other Latin American countries. We exchange words that we all say differently based on where we\xe2\x80\x99re from and the different dialects we have. This has been a great way for me to learn about other cultures and embrace the things that make us all unique. Watch the video to learn some new words in Spanish from me and my Bridgestone teammates :smiling_face_with_smiling_eyes:.\xe2\x80\x9d \xe2\x80\x93 Paola #BSATeammateTakeover'

b'\xe2\x80\x9cHaving a diversity and inclusion strategy is crucial to making your employees feel welcome and valued at work. Our employee resource groups are an integral part of that strategy, but it\xe2\x80\x99s also important to have support from leaders. It\xe2\x80\x99s inspiring to see leaders, including our CEO, speak so passionately about the importance of D&I and taking actionable steps to improve our organization. Visit the link in our bio to read more of my thoughts on the importance of D&I in the talent acquisition space.\xe2\x80\x9d\xe2\x80\x93 Paola #BSATeammateTakeover'

b'\xe2\x80\x9cI received my Masters in Clinical Psychology while studying in Barcelona. After graduating, I moved back to Mexico City, which is where I\xe2\x80\x99m from. There I worked as a counselor and in HR. My husband and I moved to Nashville in 2014 for his job, and in 2017 I joined Bridgestone as a talent acquisition specialist. I\xe2\x80\x99ve grown so much, both personally and professionally, during my time here, and have enjoyed getting to work on some unique projects \xe2\x80\x93 one of which took me to Costa Rica to train our teammates on a new system.\xe2\x80\x9d \xe2\x80\x93 Paola #BSATeammateTakeover'

b'Talent acquisition specialist Paola Mendoza is taking over the Bridgestone accounts this week as we celebrate #HispanicHeritageMonth and the launch of B~UNIDOS, our new employee resource group for Hispanic and Latinx teammates and allies. Follow along to learn about Paola\xe2\x80\x99s background, her passion for diversity and inclusion in the workplace, and what the plans are for B~UNIDOS. #BSATeammateTakeover'

b'Building strong communities starts with supporting our youth. Together with the @NFL, Bridgestone is proud to partner with @LarryFitzgerald and his #FirstDownFund to help equip students with technology that will position them to thrive in an increasingly digital world.'

b'Today we celebrate the thousands of Bridgestone #manufacturing teammates who work hard every day to ensure the quality and safety of our products. #MFGDay20
.
.
.
Visit the #LinkInBio to learn about opportunities available in our manufacturing facilities across the country.'

b'\xe2\x80\x9cMy coworkers are really like my extended family. When we were still working in the Bridgestone Tower, my team would do a happy hour every Friday after work. It\xe2\x80\x99s been hard to stay connected virtually, but we\xe2\x80\x99ve gotten creative. This summer we dropped kits off at everyone\xe2\x80\x99s house for a virtual bingo night and ended up playing for over 2 hours! Learn how you can join the Bridgestone family, visit the link in our bio.\xe2\x80\x9d \xe2\x80\x93 @barbalejandra #BSATeammateTakeover'

b'\xe2\x80\x9cOne of the biggest challenges of working from home was figuring out my new routine. I\xe2\x80\x99ve found that staying active has helped me stay motivated, so every morning I ride bikes with my friend and fellow Bridgestone teammate, Emma. I also take the time to step away from my computer at lunch to walk my dog, Rex. Follow our stories today to see my new WFH routine, and of course meet Rex :smiling_face_with_smiling_eyes:.\xe2\x80\x9d \xe2\x80\x93 Barbara #BSATeammateTakeover'

b'\xe2\x80\x9cWhat drew me to Bridgestone was their commitment to give back to local communities. Over the years I\xe2\x80\x99ve enjoying partnering with our teammates to volunteer and support those in need. During my time in Venezuela, one of my favorite initiatives was adopting a child at Christmas to give clothes and toys to, so when I moved to Chile I was excited to bring that initiative to the community there with the help of my teammates. Since joining the finance team in Nashville, I help organize a yearly visit to the Maplewood High School Automotive Training Center. Bridgestone supports this program through volunteer hours, and when our team visits we educate the class on financial planning." - Barbara #BSATeammateTakeover'

b'\xe2\x80\x9cI grew up in Venezuela, which is where I first joined the Bridgestone team after college. In one of my earlier roles I worked in procurement on our raw materials. This position allowed me to take everything I did on paper and actually see what goes into making our tires, which has been extremely helpful. In 2014 I was given the opportunity to move to Chile, where we have a sales office, before moving to Nashville in 2017. In my current role I work on our transfer pricing for the North American market, which I really enjoy as it\xe2\x80\x99s different from my background in the Latin American market.\xe2\x80\x9d \xe2\x80\x93 @barbalejandra #BSATeammateTakeover'

b'Senior financial analyst Barbara Galindo Price is taking over our accounts for this month\xe2\x80\x99s #BSATeammateTakeover. Throughout the week she\xe2\x80\x99ll be sharing her passion for giving back to the community, how her career at Bridgestone has taken her from Venezuela to Chile and now Nashville, and she\xe2\x80\x99ll even teach us some Spanish in celebration of #HispanicHeritageMonth. Follow along to learn what it means to #BeBridgestone!'

b'Despite the challenges the pandemic has created, it has given us an unprecedented chance to recalibrate as individuals, professionals, businesses and as a society. We should not waste this opportunity, as we are realizing at Bridgestone that our customers and teammates were more ready for change than we ever thought. We are fully embracing this opportunity to thrive with our teammates, our customers and with society as a whole, and we are already looking ahead to 5, 10, even 30 years from now. Click the link in our bio to read a message from our CEO and learn how Bridgestone is transforming to lead a global revolution in mobility.'

b'Bridgestone Retail Operations (BSRO) continues to support nationwide partner @bgca_clubs during these challenging times. BSRO will give all Q2 customer donations to the Boys & Girls Clubs COVID-19 Relief Fund, bringing our total support to $1.6 million. This donation will help provide support for Club kids, and their families, with immediate needs like meal delivery, virtual learning and after school care.'

b'This year marks the 75th anniversary of our Agricultural Tire Plant in Des Moines, Iowa. Since 1945, we\xe2\x80\x99ve been an active part of the local Des Moines community, and today the plant employs more than 1,300 teammates. Check out these photos of the Firestone brothers visiting the plant in the 1940\xe2\x80\x99s and an aerial shot of the facility taken in 1957. #TBT'

b'Bridgestone is committed to removing barriers in society and creating advanced solutions that increase accessibility and mobility for everyone. To further these efforts, we\xe2\x80\x99re proud to support non-profit adaptive sports organizations like Challenged Athletes Foundation, Adaptive Sports Programs of Ohio, and Amputee Blade Runners to help provide athlete grants and local programming in our communities.\n\n#ChaseYourDream #TeamBridgestone'

b'We\xe2\x80\x99re proud of our @firestoneracing team for all the hard work they put into the 104th Running of the Indianapolis 500. #DYK more than 4,400 tires were used for the race and the events leading up to it? Congratulation to Takuma Sato on his second #INDY500 victory!'

b'Together, we can build a more accessible and inclusive world for people of all abilities. That\xe2\x80\x99s why Bridgestone is proud to support the Paralympic Movement and the inspiring athletes who help us reimagine what is possible. Here\xe2\x80\x99s to #1YearToGo until the Tokyo 2020 Paralympic Games! #WaitForTheGreats #ChaseYourDream #TeamBridgestone'

b'\xe2\x80\x9cOur @firestoneracing team members each design tires for different races. I typically design tires for short, oval tracks and am responsible for 3-4 races a year. At each race, two engineers who worked on the tire get to walk down pit lane and sit on pit wall to watch how the tires perform. You have the best seat in the house as you see the cars zoom around the corner and know you helped make this. Follow our stories today as I show you behind the scenes at Indy and tell you more about the race tire design process.\xe2\x80\x9d \xe2\x80\x93 Dan #bsateammatetakeover'

b'\xe2\x80\x9cWhen I was 13 my dad took my friend and me to the time trials for the Indy 500. As a young boy, I could have never imagined I would be working on the tires and cars I was watching that day from turn one. When I went to Indy for the first time as a member of the @firestoneracing team, I recreated a photo of my friend and me on turn one from 1995 and photoshopped my current self with myself at 13. :smiling_face_with_smiling_eyes: I\xe2\x80\x99m honored to play a small role in the tradition of the 500 and the ritual of racing.\xe2\x80\x9d \xe2\x80\x93 Dan #BSATeammateTakeover'

b'\xe2\x80\x9cSomething unique about being a race tire engineer is that we have our hands in almost every step of the product lifecycle. Our design center in Akron is right next to the race tire production facility, so we can walk over and watch them being built. Much of our job is reviewing data, interviewing drivers and testing performance. We even have drivers and their teams come to our design center at the end of the season to give their feedback and preview our designs for next season. In the first photo my director @cara_adams and I are listening to feedback from Indy driver Sebastien Bourdais at the Circuit of The Americas in 2019.\xe2\x80\x9d \xe2\x80\x93 Dan #BSATeammateTakeover'

b'\xe2\x80\x9cMy dad was a computer engineer for tires, and I remember him taking me to work as a kid and thinking that I didn\xe2\x80\x99t want to work with tires because I didn\xe2\x80\x99t like the smell. After going back to school to study mechanical engineering, I found a passion for the extremes of engineering. Now I get to design tires for the fastest cars out there. In every job you\xe2\x80\x99re going to have good days and bad days, but I am happy to have found a job that is fun and continues to drive my passion.\xe2\x80\x9d \xe2\x80\x93 Dan #BSATeammateTakeover'

b'Firestone Racing engineer Dan Bishop is taking over our accounts this week as we approach the 104th running of the Indianapolis 500 on Sunday. This year\xe2\x80\x99s race will be different than any other as there will be no fans in attendance, which is just one of several measures in place to keep drivers and their teams safe. Follow along to get a behind the scenes look at the track, learn how race tires are made and hear how Dan became a program engineer. #BSATeammateTakeover'

b'Congrats to Jerry Kelly, the 2020 Bridgestone SENIOR PLAYERS champion! A deserving major winner after a great week at Firestone Country Club that raised $750,000 for charity. Thanks to the incredible staff and all of the volunteers who made it possible! #BridgestoneSP'

b'In these challenging times, support for our local communities is more important than ever. We\xe2\x80\x99re proud to pull together with our fellow tournament partners and the PGA TOUR Champions to help this week\xe2\x80\x99s Bridgestone SENIOR PLAYERS Championship generate $750,000 for deserving non-profits across Akron and Northeast Ohio. #BridgestoneSP'

b'In an effort to mitigate the spread of COVID-19, we are proud to participate in the #TNStrong Mask Movement by donating 10,000 child-sized masks to @bgcmidtn. The masks will be distributed across the state to ensure Club kids have a well-fitting mask to wear while at their local Club, school or running errands with their parents.'

b"On this day 120 years ago, Harvey Firestone founded the Firestone Tire & Rubber Company, making his dream a reality. Harvey's drive and innovation in the industry has paved the way for us to continue building tires to meet the needs of our customers for more than a century."

b'\xe2\x80\x9cIn addition to being a global company, Bridgestone has a diverse portfolio of businesses, which is one of the reasons I love working here. I\xe2\x80\x99m excited to continue looking forward to how we can build better solutions for the industries we support. To learn how you can join the Bridgestone team, click the link in our bio.\xe2\x80\x9d \xe2\x80\x93 Bryan #BSATeammateTakeover'

b'\xe2\x80\x9cAs a dad with 3 kids, working from home has its challenges, but it also has benefits such as being able to spend more time with family. Some of the things that have helped me stay productive are having my workspace tucked away in a quiet part of my house, communicating with my team through video calls and keeping a positive mindset. Follow our stories as I take you along throughout my day..\xe2\x80\x9d \xe2\x80\x93 Bryan #BSATeammateTakeover'

b'\xe2\x80\x9cDuring my time at Bridgestone I\xe2\x80\x99ve had some truly unforgettable opportunities. In 2018 I went to PyeongChang for the Olympic Winter Games where I managed hospitality and got to go to some of the events, including hockey and skiing. Another highlight was filming a commercial in South Africa, where I was on set to ensure our messaging was coming through in various scenes.\xe2\x80\x9d \xe2\x80\x93 Bryan #BSATeammateTakeover'

b'\xe2\x80\x9cI joined the Bridgestone team five years ago in the marketing department. Over the past two years I have been working to develop and market mobility solutions that meet customers\xe2\x80\x99 needs and build a better future. There\xe2\x80\x99s a lot that goes into how people and goods move. The Mobility Solutions team at Bridgestone is working to create a roadmap for the future to ensure customers and society move, in a safe, seamless and easy way.\xe2\x80\x9d \xe2\x80\x93 Bryan #BSATeammateTakeover'

b'Bryan Smith is taking over the Bridgestone accounts for this month\xe2\x80\x99s #BSATeammateTakeover. Follow along to learn what led Bryan to Bridgestone, how he\xe2\x80\x99s staying connected with his teammates while working from home and how his role in Mobility Solutions is shaping the future of the automotive and transportation industries. #BeBridgestone'
b'Check out our biggest environmental achievements of the year. Head to the link in our bio to see our 2019-2020 Sustainability Report. #OurWaytoServe'

b'Like the world\xe2\x80\x99s great athletes, we remain focused on the road ahead despite obstacles and setbacks. With #1YearToGo until the rescheduled Olympic Games Tokyo 2020, we look forward to helping the Olympic Movement safely reunite the world next summer in a celebration of sport, solidarity and the human spirit. #StrongerTogether #ChaseYourDream #TeamBridgestone'
b'We have a global goal to reduce our CO2 emissions by 30% (vs. 2011) by 2030. Head to the link in our bio to learn about our progress. #OurWayToServe'
b'We want our tires to be made sustainably, have a longer service life and accelerate circular economy models into our business. Head to the link in our bio to read more. #OurWayToServe'
b'Every drop counts. Our goal is to use less water to produce our tires. Head to the link in our bio to read more. #OurWayToServe'
b'We believe that we can make an impact in the world through road safety education. Head to the link in our bio to read about our programs. #OurWayToServe'
b'We want to create a more inclusive, accessible society for all. Head to the link in our bio to learn about PlusStop. #OurWayToServe'

b'#PrideMonth looked a bit different this year, but that didn\xe2\x80\x99t stop BProud, our employee resource group for LGBTQ+ teammates and allies, from celebrating! Check out these photos of Bridgestone teammates celebrating #Pride from home. #BeBridgestone'

b'\xe2\x80\x9cWorking at Bridgestone has given me many opportunities to grow personally and professionally. I\xe2\x80\x99ve moved across the country, attended events including the Indianapolis 500 and participated in a leadership program that allowed me to meet with teammates across many different business units and at various Bridgestone sites. Through this, I gained knowledge about our company at a broader and deeper level, as well as studied different leadership styles.\xe2\x80\x9d \xe2\x80\x93 John #BSATeammateTakeover'

b'\xe2\x80\x9cCheck out our stories throughout the day as I share my day as a Bridgestone teammate working from home. I\xe2\x80\x99ll show you some of the hobbies I\xe2\x80\x99ve taken on, tell you more about BProud and how we\xe2\x80\x99re celebrating #PrideMonth, and I might even introduce you to my 100 lbs. black lab.\xe2\x80\x9d \xe2\x80\x93 John #BSATeammateTakeover'

b'\xe2\x80\x9cOne of the ways I manage to stay motivated and productive while working from home is to set small achievable goals every day. Prior to going to sleep every night, I set three small personal goals and three small work goals for the following day. I log them in my phone as \xe2\x80\x9ctasks\xe2\x80\x9d in the \xe2\x80\x9creminders\xe2\x80\x9d app and check them off as I do them. It gives me a sense of accountability and accomplishment, which is important for my mental health. \xe2\x80\x9d \xe2\x80\x93 John #BSATeammateTakeover'

b'\xe2\x80\x9cI am on the board of BProud, our employee resource group for LGBTQ+ teammates and allies at Bridgestone. I was hesitant to join at first because I never considered myself as an LGBT activist and wasn\xe2\x80\x99t really interested in mixing that portion of my life with my professional career. I asked the founders why they were forming BProud and the answer was so impactful to me that it completely changed my outlook. They said \xe2\x80\x9cWe believe everyone should have the right to come to work and be their authentic self.\xe2\x80\x9d Not only do I want to be my authentic self at work, but I wanted that for all of my teammates in Bridgestone, and that\xe2\x80\x99s why I joined BProud.\xe2\x80\x9d \xe2\x80\x93 John #BSATeammateTakeover #PrideMonth #PrideWorldwide'

b'John Sylvina is taking over the Bridgestone accounts for this month\xe2\x80\x99s #BSATeammateTakeover. John will be sharing his WFH tips, how BProud, our employee resource group for LGBTQ+ teammates and allies, is celebrating #PrideMonth from home this year and more. Follow along to learn what it means to #BeBridgestone #PRIDE'

b'Diversity and inclusion is a continuous journey, and while we have made some progress internally over the last few years, we have the responsibility to do more.

We know that there are no quick fixes, and that symbolic gestures, financial or otherwise, are not enough. But as a leader in our industry and a company with a large footprint in the U.S., we pledge to do better and to be better.

Click the link in our bio to read a message from our CEO Paolo Ferrari outlining the initial steps Bridgestone Americas will take to help create a more equal world for all. #BlackLivesMatter'

b'Bridgestone believes in the power of sport and the Olympic spirit to unite people across all borders and backgrounds. Now more than ever, the themes of #OlympicDay have deeper meaning as we all work to keep moving, learning and discovering in challenging times. Together, we can #StayStrong. #TeamBridgestone #ChaseYourDream'

b'\xe2\x80\x9cWhile working from home presents it\xe2\x80\x99s challenges when you\xe2\x80\x99re used to being in a collaborative office space, over the past few months I\xe2\x80\x99ve found a schedule and set up that works for me. My team has continued to stay connected virtually and I\xe2\x80\x99m lucky to have a manager that has emphasized the importance of prioritizing taking time for ourselves and our families. Thanks for following along this week, stay safe!\xe2\x80\x9d \xe2\x80\x93 Prashant #BSATeammateTakeover'

b'\xe2\x80\x9cSome of the things I enjoy most about my job are the people I work with and that I learn something new each day. I also like that we work with local schools to educate students interested in #STEM. Last year I had the opportunity to share some of my tire knowledge with a group of high school students by teaching them what we do to tires to improve noise levels, which was very rewarding.\xe2\x80\x9d \xe2\x80\x93 Prashant #BSATeammateTakeover'

b'\xe2\x80\x9cI joined Bridgestone as part of the Navigator program, which allows new hires to learn about Bridgestone facilities across the U.S. and cross-train at one before settling into their full time role in Akron. This gave me the chance to travel to several of our locations across the country, including the manufacturing facilities where we produce our tires, our Americas HQ in Nashville and the Firestone Industrial Products Technical Center, where I worked for 9 weeks. Through this experience I was able to work with people outside of our tire business, and it showed me just how diverse our company is.\xe2\x80\x9d \xe2\x80\x93 Prashant #BSATeammateTakeover'

b'\xe2\x80\x9cFollow Bridgestone\xe2\x80\x99s stories throughout the day to see what a typical day looks like while I\xe2\x80\x99m working from home. You\xe2\x80\x99ll see my \xe2\x80\x9chome office\xe2\x80\x9d and maybe get to meet my wife \xe2\x80\x93 we just got married in January!\xe2\x80\x9d \xe2\x80\x93 Prashant #BSATeammateTakeover'

b'This month\xe2\x80\x99s #BSATeammateTakeover looks a bit different than usual. Many of our teammates are working from home due to the COVID-19 crisis. So, we\xe2\x80\x99ve asked Prashant, one of our research engineers in Akron, to give an inside look at his Bridgestone career, share his WFH setup and more. Follow along to learn what it means to #BeBridgestone'

b'This #MilitaryAppreciationMonth we are proud to recognize our veteran teammates, those still actively serving our country and the military family members who support them. BRAVO (Bridgestone Americas Veterans Organization) is a prime example of how our teammates continue to join together to support military causes and engage in the fellowship of service. #BeBridgestone'
b"Bridgestone Women's Initiative Network (BWIN) members are finding creative ways to encourage one another while many of our teammates are working from home. #BeBridgestone"

b'Our company\xe2\x80\x99s history in Akron, OH dates back over 100 years. During this difficult time, we are proud to continue serving the NE Ohio region by giving to the @acrfoodbank as well as the Akron-Summit County COVID -19 Emergency Crisis Fund. #OurWaytoServe'
b'In Nashville, we continue to #LightItBlue at Bridgestone Tower in support of the frontline workers who are bravely fighting against COVID-19. #StaySafe'

b'A HUGE thank you to our teammates for supporting our company\xe2\x80\x99s efforts to donate critical supplies to local medical professionals! Our Akron teammates are using at-home 3D printers to produce face shields for the NE Ohio community. #OurWaytoServe'

b'Bridgestone Retail Operations (BSRO) is a proud, nationwide partner of Boys & Girls Clubs of America. During the COVID-19 pandemic, @bgca_clubs services are more important than ever. To help support, BSRO is giving all customer donations made in Q1 2020 to the BGCA COVID-19 Relief Fund. This donation will help provide Club Kids, their families and local communities with critical resources like meal delivery, childcare for essential service workers, and virtual classroom learning. :backhand_index_pointing_right:#linkinbio to learn more.'

b'When there are so many unknowns, one thing is for certain: we are #TeamBridgestone, and we are proud to support the Olympic and Paralympic Movement. We look forward to seeing the world come together next summer on the #RoadtoTokyo2020 #StayStrong'

b"Bridgestone Women's Initiative Network was our first employee resource group at Bridgestone. Over the years, they have made great strides to elevate women and promote gender equality in the workplace. Watch and learn how this organization of women and allies is positioning women to thrive. #WomensHistoryMonth #BeBridgestone http://ow.ly/GbfK50z1nLW"

b'This week, Bridgestone is showcasing its total suite of off-the-road (OTR) tire management solutions at #conexpo2020 in Las Vegas \xe2\x80\x93 North America\xe2\x80\x99s largest construction trade show. The Bridgestone exhibit booth demonstrates how the OTR team is going beyond the tire to deliver a full suite of product, technology and service solutions to maximize productivity and help customers move more, every day.'

b'Last week members of BRAVO, our employee resource group for veterans and those who support veteran causes, attended Military Appreciation night at the @PredsnHL game. Thank you to our Bridgestone teammates for continuing to serve and engage with our community! #BeBridgestone'

b'Today and every day, Bridgestone is thankful for the women driving change in our industry and our company. Join us in celebrating the uniquely valuable contributions they make to our culture and to society. A few of these amazing women are sharing their wisdom and experience on our Instagram stories today. Head over and check it out! #InternationalWomensDay #IWD2020 #EachForEqual'

b'\xe2\x80\x9cWhen I was moving to Nashville I was looking for more ways to get involved with the organization outside my day-to-day role. I joined one of our employee resource groups, BNextGen, as the co-chair of their volunteering committee. That gave me the opportunity to get outside in the community to plant trees, work in food pantries, and eventually led to me becoming co-chair of the Bridgestone United Way Campaign last year.\xe2\x80\x9d \xe2\x80\x93 Brandon #BSATeammateTakeover'

b'\xe2\x80\x9cTo give you an idea of what it\xe2\x80\x99s like to be a Bridgestone engineer, I\xe2\x80\x99ll be posting stories throughout my day at the Bridgestone Tower. Be sure to follow along!\xe2\x80\x9d \xe2\x80\x93 Brandon #BSATeammateTakeover'

b'\xe2\x80\x9cBeing a part of a global business unit gives you exciting opportunities. When I was just two weeks into my role, I traveled to Germany to work with one of our suppliers. I ended up going to Europe four times within my first four months. Even in my day-to-day role here at the Bridgestone Tower in Nashville, I spend a lot of time on the phone talking with customers and vendors from other countries or working with my European counterparts.\xe2\x80\x9d \xe2\x80\x93 Brandon #BSATeammateTakeover'

b'\xe2\x80\x9cFrom an early age, I was interested in all things science and technology \xe2\x80\x93 as you can see from my space camp photos. I especially liked chemistry which led me to studying chemical engineering, the basis for my current role and many potential future roles.  The STEM education of an engineer provides endless opportunities for ones\xe2\x80\x99 career; in fact, many of our Firestone Industrial Products leaders and even our current president have a background in engineering.\xe2\x80\x9d \xe2\x80\x93 Brandon #BSATeammateTakeover'

b'Engineer Brandon Adcock is taking over the Bridgestone accounts this week for our February #BSATeammateTakeover! Brandon works in our Firestone Industrial Products business on the cord reinforcement and compounds that go into our air springs. Follow to learn what drew him to engineering and some of the unique opportunities he\xe2\x80\x99s had throughout his career at Bridgestone. #BeBridgestone'

b'Whether you live in the mountains or only see snow once a year, knowing how to drive safely in winter conditions can help keep you and your family safe. Properly maintaining your tires is critical! b'Our employee resource group BBOLD adopted @kipp_nashville and KIPP Antioch as Reading Partners along with partner @pencil4schools. To support these schools, teammates read with students weekly to close the reading achievement gap in Nashville, and this month they are hosting a school supply drive in honor of #BlackHistoryMonth.'

b"2019 was a big year for our Employee Resource Groups (ERGs) with the launch of BBOLD and BPROUD. Our now five ERGs are made up of 1,476 teammates and 40 executives. In 2019, 400+ ERG members volunteered 1,061 hours in the communities where we move, live, work and play. We're excited to see what our ERGs have in store for 2020. #BeBridgestone"

b'\xe2\x80\x9cThe collaboration I\xe2\x80\x99ve experienced across Bridgestone has been very impactful. Not only have I been able to travel the world to work alongside teammates in other regions, I\xe2\x80\x99ve learned about their cultures and the way they do business, been exposed to many different areas of our company and grown both professionally and personally.\xe2\x80\x9d \xe2\x80\x93 Martin  #BSATeammateTakeover'

b'\xe2\x80\x9cIn every location I\xe2\x80\x99ve worked in from Argentina to Nashville, there have been many leaders who have greatly influenced my career and personal development.\xe2\x80\x9d \xe2\x80\x93 Martin #BSATeammateTakeover'

b'\xe2\x80\x9cWhen I\xe2\x80\x99m not at work, my family enjoys being in nature, playing #soccer, paddle boarding, #grilling and spending time with our three dogs.\xe2\x80\x9d \xe2\x80\x93 Martin #BSATeammateTakeover #dogsofinstagram'

b'\xe2\x80\x9cI am originally from Argentina, which is where I joined Bridgestone 12 years ago as a Senior Buyer. In 2013, I was given the opportunity to relocate to Sao Paulo, #Brazil and then to #Nashville in 2014 where I have held various roles in #procurement. Currently I am an Indirect Procurement Manager handling different commodities used in our #manufacturing process.\xe2\x80\x9d \xe2\x80\x93 Martin #BSATeammateTakeover'

b'This week Martin Cava is taking over the Bridgestone accounts for the first #BSATeammateTakeover of 2020! Martin will share how he transitioned from a role at our manufacturing facility in Argentina to our Americas HQ in #Nashville, what he\xe2\x80\x99s learned from working at a truly global company and more. Follow along to learn what it means to #BeBridgestone'
b'Yesterday, members of our employee resource group B-BOLD celebrated the life of Rev. Dr. Martin Luther King Jr. at the MLK Day March in Nashville.'
b'Last week at #CES2020, we unveiled a number of #mobility solutions aimed to improve the way people move, live, work and play. Watch this inside look at all of our #BridgestoneCES innovations!'
b'Our teammates embody what it means to #BeBridgestone! We are proud of all the hard work and planning this global team put into our first-ever @ces appearance at #CES2020 last week. #BridgestoneCES'

b'Tires will play an important role in the future of #autonomousdriving. Using tire sensors and powerful simulation capabilities, we\xe2\x80\x99ve built a digital twin of the tire which, paired with our connected tire technology, can be used to generate predictions to enhance the precision of vehicle safety systems. #BridgestoneCES #CES2020'

b'At Bridgestone, we\xe2\x80\x99re increasing efficiency through our WEBFLEET platform. Using an interactive simulation, #CES2020 attendees are witnessing how this technology is advancing safety and improving cost efficiency for fleets around the world. #BridgestoneCES'
b'From air free to the moon, we are enjoying showing off all of our latest tire technologies here at #CES2020! #BridgestoneCES'

b'Today media from around the world got a sneak peek at our first-ever #BridgestoneCES booth! Stay tuned throughout the week as we reveal our latest innovative technology including airless tires, connected tire technology for proactive safety and our WEBFLEET platform simulation. #CES2020'

b'#DYK tires will play an important role in the future of mobility? Come by our booth at #CES2020 to see our latest innovations and learn how you can win 1 of 5 Bridgestone prize packs. #BridgestoneCES'

b'Next week at @ces, we\xe2\x80\x99re unveiling how Bridgestone is extending mobility through our portfolio of advanced air free tires. Follow @Bridgestone and #BridgestoneCES on social media to see all of the innovations we\xe2\x80\x99ll showcase at #CES2020.'
